skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: AJV009

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only design guidelines and instructions for AI-generated frontend code. No executable code, filesystem access, network calls, or external command execution.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to create memorable, polished web interfaces because generic AI outputs produce bland, derivative designs. This skill guides the AI to commit to bold aesthetic directions and deliver production-grade, creative frontend code that stands out.
actual_capabilities: Generate production-ready HTML/CSS/JS, React, or Vue components
Apply bold aesthetic directions (minimalist, maximalist, retro-futuristic, brutalist, etc.)
Create custom typography pairings and cohesive color themes
Implement CSS animations, micro-interactions, and scroll-triggered effects
Design spatial compositions with asymmetry, grids, and creative layouts
limitations: Does not access external design systems or component libraries directly
Cannot test code in live browsers or validate accessibility automatically
Relies on user-provided context for technical constraints and requirements

use_cases.title: Build striking UI components
use_cases.description: Create memorable buttons, cards, navigation bars, and page layouts that stand out from generic templates

use_cases.title: Implement creative designs
use_cases.description: Execute bold design visions with production-quality code, animations, and attention to detail

use_cases.title: Design landing pages
use_cases.description: Build visually stunning landing pages with unique aesthetics and engaging interactions

prompt_templates.title: Basic component request
prompt_templates.scenario: User wants a simple UI component
prompt_templates.prompt: Design and build a [component type] for a [purpose] page. Choose a bold aesthetic direction and implement production-ready code.

prompt_templates.title: Themed interface request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a [page/component] with a [aesthetic: e.g., brutalist, art deco, organic/natural] aesthetic. Include typography pairings, color variables, and animations.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive component
prompt_templates.prompt: Build an interactive [component] with hover states, scroll-triggered animations, and micro-interactions. Use CSS-first approach for animations.

prompt_templates.title: Full page design
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a complete [page type] with spatial composition, unexpected layout choices, atmospheric backgrounds, and cohesive visual details. Include all code needed.

output_examples.input: Create a pricing card component for a SaaS product
output: PricingCard component with bold typography and subtle shadows
Three pricing tiers with visual hierarchy and accent colors
Hover effects with smooth CSS transitions
Responsive grid layout with mobile stack
CSS custom properties for easy theming

best_practices: Commit to a clear aesthetic direction before coding - minimalism or maximalism both work when executed with intention
Choose distinctive typography pairings that elevate the design beyond generic system fonts
Use CSS variables and custom properties to maintain visual consistency across components
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto without intentional styling choices
Applying timid, evenly-distributed color palettes instead of bold dominant colors with sharp accents
Creating predictable layouts without spatial composition, asymmetry, or grid-breaking elements

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with HTML/CSS/JS, React, Vue, and similar frontend frameworks. You can specify your preferred framework in the prompt.

faq.question: Can I use this for mobile-responsive designs?
faq.answer: Yes. Include responsive requirements in your prompt and the generated code will include appropriate media queries and breakpoints.

faq.question: Does this skill access external design systems?
faq.answer: No. The skill generates custom code but you can paste design system documentation for the AI to incorporate.

faq.question: Is the generated code production-ready?
faq.answer: The code follows production practices including semantic HTML, accessibility considerations, and CSS organization.

faq.question: Can I request dark mode implementations?
faq.answer: Yes. Specify dark mode in your prompt and the generated code will include CSS variables and dark theme styling.

faq.question: How does this differ from standard code generation?
faq.answer: This skill prioritizes distinctive aesthetics, creative direction, and design intentionality over generic template-based outputs.
